Mascot.instruction: Use Spline for the 3D character if possible. If dependencies fail, fallback to a 2D animated glowing avatar.

layout_patterns.hero: Full-screen height, split layout (Text Left, Interactive 3D/Mascot Right). Background needs a subtle grid or particle effect.
layout_patterns.bento_grid: Use CSS Grid with variable row/col spans for the Portfolio section. Don't use uniform cards.
layout_patterns.scrolling: Implement 'Lenis' for smooth momentum scrolling. This is CRITICAL for the high-end feel.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. SETUP: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and font families (Space Grotesk, Manrope).
3. STRUCTURE: Create a 'components/Layout.js' that wraps the app with 'Lenis' (Smooth Scroll) and a custom 'Cursor' component.
4. COMPONENT - CURSOR: Create a custom cursor that follows the mouse. It should be a small glowing dot that expands when hovering over interactive elements (buttons, links).

5. COMPONENT - MASCOT: In the Hero section, try to implement a 3D mascot. You can use a Spline Viewer (via iframe or @splinetool/react-spline) or a simple CSS/Framer Motion animated character if 3D is too heavy.
6. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for scroll reveal animations. Every section title should slide up and fade in.
7. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use '.js' and '.jsx' for all files. DO NOT use TypeScript (.ts, .tsx).
8. SHADCN: Modify existing Shadcn components to match the 'dark neon' aesthetic. Remove white backgrounds, add borders and glows.
9. NAVIGATION: Create a floating navbar with glassmorphism (backdrop-blur).
10. DO NOT use generic AI emojis (ðŸš€, ðŸ’¡). Use 'lucide-react' icons or custom SVG shapes.
11. PARALLAX: Use 'useScroll' and 'useTransform' from framer-motion for parallax effects on images and text.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
